name: Camille's Coffee
description:
Game for the coffee game jam https://itch.io/jam/coffee-jam 

Camille is having trouble waking up, she needs to get a coffee and she starts dreaming about it.

Follow Camille on her dream to recover the Golden Cup of Coffee

Watch her caffeine level, if it goes below normal Camille can feel tired and if she has a lot of caffeine she will be hyperactive 

Game is still a work in progress, we have level one and assets for the final level.

The character has an ability to push/pull objects by pressing shift on keyboard but there are  no implemented objects to push/pull in the first level.

Art - Jimena Fernández

itch.io - https://itch.io/profile/ookamijime

Coffee Maker -each one had to prepare their own coffee....

Level Design - .... We actually need a level designer, the first level was "designed" by Jimena Fernandez

Controls

WASD

Space bar to jump

CTRL to consume coffee

prepared for common pc controls
